channel.title: How to change were item is held! help please!
channel.description: when i equip a lot of my items on my server... lets says its a barrows phat... it equips it to the players wep position instead of the hat place... can someone tell me how to fix this.. its on delta. thanks

item.title: How to change were item is held! help please!
item.dc:creator: @nickypie nickypie
item.description:
@nickypie wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Bobby, post:4, topic:361488”]its not spam open up item.java and find this

Helm[]

and you see all of those numbers, there item IDS that are helmets or in other words you wear them on your head.

see this

fullMask[]

all of the numbers under that is also item ids they are full masks so like h’ween masks, now find where you want your item to go, by default it will go in weapon slot.[/quote]

omg thanks… i wish i could rep u!

Read full topic
item.source: How to change were item is held! help please!

item.title: How to change were item is held! help please!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bobby Mr. Bobby
item.description:
@Mr_Bobby wrote:

its not spam open up item.java and find this

Helm[]

and you see all of those numbers, there item IDS that are helmets or in other words you wear them on your head.

see this

fullMask[]

all of the numbers under that is also item ids they are full masks so like h’ween masks, now find where you want your item to go, by default it will go in weapon slot.
